articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kim Ik Hyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Kim Ik Hyon
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath on January 16 to the bier of the late KPA Vice-Marshal Kim Ik Hyon, member of the WPK Central Committee and deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Ik Hyon Dies
articles.content:
Kim Ik Hyon Dies
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Ik Hyon, member of the WPK Central Committee and deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, died of long illness at 19:00 of Jan. 15 at the age of 87 to our sorrow.
					 An obituary of Kim Ik Hyon was published Friday by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 According to it, he was a revolutionary soldier loyal to the WPK as he devoted his all to the struggle for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 It said:
					
					 He participated in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led by President Kim Il Sung and bravely fought to defend the headquarters of the revolution and liberate the country with arms in his hand.
					
					 After the liberation of the country he made positive efforts to unite young people close around the party, build regular revolutionary armed forces and firmly defend the revolutionary base in the northern half of Korea in hearty response to the line of building a new country put forward by the President. During the arduous Fatherland Liberation War fought to beat back the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion he led servicepersons to crush enemies, contributing to the victory in the war.
					
					 After the war, he thoroughly implemented the party's self-defensive military line, holding an important post in the People's Army, and thus contributed to developing the army into invincible revolutionary armed forces. He devotedly worked to materialize the party's idea of building a militia force, true to it.
					
					 He was awarded the title of twice hero of the DPRK and "Order of Kim Il Sung", the highest order of the DPRK, and many other state commendations for the feats he performed for the country and the revolution. 
					
					 Though he died, the feats he performed for the party, the revolution, the country and the people will shine long, noted the obituary.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Foreign Ministry for Staff Members of Chinese Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Foreign Ministry for Staff Members of Chinese Embassy
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs arranged a reception Friday for the staff members of the Chinese embassy here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 Present there on invitation were Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Yong Il, vice minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials of the ministry were present there.
					
					Pak in his speech referred to the fact that the relations between the DPRK and China grew strong in various fields last year under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and General Secretary Hu Jintao and the friendly feelings of the two peoples further deepened.
					
					 He expressed belief that the events to be held in "the year of DPRK-China friendship," the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries, would help demonstrate the solidity of the bilateral friendship.
					
					Liu Xiaoming said in his speech that the Sino-DPRK relations have been developed in different fields in 2008 under deep care of Hu Jintao and Kim Jong Il and joint efforts of the two sides.
					
					  He stressed the need to pool efforts to successfully hold friendship events as agreed upon by the top leaders of the two countries and bring about more beautiful future of the Sino-DPRK cooperative relations.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was so kind as to send a birthday spread to Ho Nam Gum, a centenarian residing in Changchon-ri, Hwadae County, North Hamgyong Province.
					 Born into a poor peasant's family in the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, she had to lead a bitter life as a member of the ruined nation, being subject to all sorts of maltreatment and contempt. It was only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthwhile life as a human being.
					
					 She worked hard to increase the grain production for many years and makes herself busy even after she became a pensioner.
					
					 She always keeps herself in good health as she is optimistic without having unbalanced diet.

articles.title: International and National Sports Contests to Be Held in 2009
articles.content:
International and National Sports Contests to Be Held in 2009
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Many international and national sports contests will be held in the DPRK this year.
					The International Association of Athletics Federations-the 22nd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon and the 18th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize are to be held amid the interests of sports experts and fans on the respective occasions of the significant Day of the Sun and the auspicious February holiday.
					
					The DPRK soccer team will match with its rivals of the Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates and Iran in the Asian final preliminaries for FIFA 2010 World Cup from February.
					
					The 23rd Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament will be held in August.
					
					There will be national sports contests such as the Paektusan Prize Sports Contest (February), the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest (April), the Pochonbo Torch Prize Sports Contest (June), the National Combined Sports Contest among Provinces (June), the 12th National Jongilbong Prize Taekwon-Do Championships (June), the Jonsung Cup Sports Contest (July), the DPRK Championships (September) and the Osandok Prize Sports Contest (December).

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to Art Work
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to Art Work
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to orchestra and chorus "Snow Falls," a monumental masterpiece of the Songun era.
					 "Snow Falls" is a masterpiece of national value which demonstrated the successful development of the Juche-oriented music and art as it perfectly embodied the Workers' Party of Korea's original ideas on literature and art calling for creating orchestra, chorus and mood of Korean style.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding state commendation took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Thursday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, and creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus.
					
					 At the ceremony Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to the orchestra and chorus and honorary titles, orders and medals to creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 78 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 78 Off Press
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Volume 78 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", library of the great Juche idea, which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works according to a chronological order.
					 The book contains 38 works of President Kim Il Sung including speeches, conclusions and talks made by him between July and December, Juche 72 (1983).
					
					 His speech "The DPRK Represents Genuine People's Power and Is a Banner of the Unity and Solidarity of the Masses" made at a banquet in celebration of the 35th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK indicates the ideas and policies for strengthening the DPRK government, a powerful weapon for the revolution and construction, enhancing its function and role, achieving national reunification and making the whole world independent.
					
					 "Let Us Bring about a New Turn in Socialist Economic Construction", "On Concentrating Our Efforts on the Five Fronts of Socialist Economic Construction", "A Speech at the Permanent Committee of the Administration Council of the DPRK" and his other works clarify tasks and ways for further developing the economy of the country and drastically improving the standard of the people's living.
					
					 In "On Some Problems Arising in Working Out Plan of the National Economy Next Year", "On Establishing the Revolutionary World Outlook among the Officials" and other works the President underscored the need to correctly combine the organization of economic affairs, the party's political work and collective guidance and unified command, realize the unified and detailed planning and also the need for the officials to firmly establish the revolutionary world outlook and hasten the revolution and construction.
					
					 The book also contains such works as "Let Us Shatter Imperialist Moves towards Aggression and War and Safeguard Peace and Independence" and "For the Development of the National Culture of the Newly-Emerging Countries". They give answers to questions arising in defending world peace and realizing the independent development of the countries.

articles.title: New Books Published
articles.content:
New Books Published
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Publishing House has of late brought out new books.
					Among them are the books "Great Man and Music" and "Questions and Answers on Songun Politics" and the full-length novel "River Rimjin" (Part one "Woman of the North").
					
					"Great Man and Music" gives an impressive description of the peerless greatness and immortal feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has left footmarks of great leadership, accompanied by music.
					
					"Questions and Answers on Songun Politics" gives a comprehensive account of the creation and development in depth of Songun politics, its validity and invincible vitality in the question-and-answer form.
					
					The full-length novel "River Rimjin" (Part One "Woman of the North") portrays through a vivid artistic depiction a woman who happened to part with her husband during the Fatherland Liberation War. She, with her children, grows to be a full-fledged master of the country in the bosom of the DPRK and enjoys a worthy life and happiness, living stoutly with an ardent desire for the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Socio-political Activities Get Brisk
articles.content:
Socio-political Activities Get Brisk
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Students of the DPRK are doing their bit in seething realities during the vacation in response to the call of the joint New Year editorial.
					A lot of students have been visiting the Pyongyang Thermal-power Complex from the outset of the new year from more than 10 universities in Pyongyang such as Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chol Ju University of Education, Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry and Pyongyang University of Medicine.
					
					They brought home to the power producers there the content of the editorial and the letter sent by the workers of Kangson to the working people across the country.
					
					They gave sincere labor and material assistance to the workers.
					
					Their forceful political work and labor assistance raised the morale of the workers so as to increase the power production from the first shift of the year.
					
					Meanwhile students of Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and other universities found themselves on socialist co-op farms where they helped agricultural working people in farming preparation of the year.
					
					They carried a vast amount of manure to fields together with peasants and explained in a profound way during breaks the content of the joint editorial calling for concentrating all efforts on hitting this year's target of grain production with the extraordinary determination to solve food problem by the Korean people's efforts in any circumstances to cope with the world-wide food crisis.
					
					Inspired by the students, the agricultural working people are striving harder to reap a good harvest this year with a high degree of responsibility for the grain production of the country.
					
					Local students are also doing similar activities with a will to contribute their mite to adorning this year as a year of a new revolutionary upsurge which will be specially recorded in the history of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Ishihara's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Ishihara's Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Ishihara, governor of Tokyo Metropolis of Japan, asserted at a press conference on January 13 that "the best way is to have north Korea absorbed by China and then the former may be disintegrated  in a peaceful way."
					 These are the thrice-cursed outbursts intended to reduce the DPRK, an independent and sovereign state, to a "subject country" of somebody and colonize it.
					
					 Ishihara is nothing but a political hysteric without an equal as he denied the existence of a sovereign state itself and did not hesitate to assert that it should be "annexed" to other country in the political, economic and military aspects.
					
					 His reckless outbursts are lashing the Korean people into great fury as they seriously hurt the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Ishihara called a modern day Hitler has got more frantic than anybody else in "justifying" Japan's military occupation of Asian countries in the past.
					
					  This is evidenced by his assertion that the Pacific War fought by the Japanese imperialists was a "war for liberating colonial countries" and the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", aimed at legalizing Japan's occupation of Korea, was concluded by "the general will of the Koreans."
					
					 Due to the Japanese imperialists' policy of colonial rule over Korea which he has repeatedly justified, the Korean people were subject to harsh exploitation and oppression and the dignity of the Korean nation was mercilessly violated in the last century.
					
					 Nevertheless, Ishihara blustered that the Korean people should be "annexed "to a neighboring country. This is the most unbearable insult and challenge to the DPRK and the Korean nation.
					
					 Lurking behind such utterances of the said lunatic intended to justify Japan's history of aggression and make a new "colony" in Northeast Asia is a sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to dodge the settlement of the past and step up Japan's militarization.
					
					 Ishihara is a guy representing Japan's ultra-right conservative forces preoccupied by the ambition for overseas expansion and aggression and a spokesman for them.
					
					 It is their calculation that if the DPRK was "absorbed" by somebody, as asserted by him, there would be no discussion on the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people and no issue of reparation would surface on the international arena. This is, indeed, a foolish dream.
					
					 The DPRK is a universally recognized legitimate sovereign state and its territory is a precious asset for its people's life and wealth for the prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 We will never allow anyone to encroach upon our inviolable sovereignty and territory.

articles.title: Dynamic Advance of June 15 Era of Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic Advance of June 15 Era of Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, January 16 (KNCA) -- No force on earth can stem the trend of the June 15 era of reunification making advance thanks to the strong desire and will of the Korean nation for reunification, says Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article.
					 It is the unanimous faith and will of the fellow countrymen in the north and the south to achieve national reunification independently by their concerted efforts in the spirit of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The most important task facing the Korean nation this year is to vigorously advance the June 15 era of reunification by foiling the Lee Myung Bak group's moves for confrontation with the DPRK and reenergizing the national reunification movement under the slogan "Advance dynamically along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration!" put up by the joint editorial.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the national reunification movement will make a dynamic advance and big progress will be made in the June 15 era of reunification when all fellow countrymen wage an uninterrupted stubborn struggle with a do-or-die determination and will to shatter the anti-reunification and confrontational moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and bring the day of independent reunification without fail under the banner of the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 The cause of independent reunification is sure to be accomplished as the above-said declarations which serve as declarations of national independence and great national unity and great programmes for national reunification indicate the way of achieving national reunification and the countrymen support them and have the strong faith and will to implement them. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out as one full of confidence in a sacred struggle to achieve national unity on the principle of national independence, smash all sorts of moves of the anti-reunification forces and accomplish the cause of national reunification at any cost through their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Resignation of Puppet Public Prosecutor General Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Puppet Public Prosecutor General Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea struggling to force the Lee Myung Bak "government" to step down released a statement titled "The public prosecutor general, a henchman of the dictatorial regime, resign at once" on Jan. 10.
					 The statement accused the public prosecutor general of branding the forces waging a progressive movement as "the forces spreading the pro-north leftist idea and seeking public disorder" on January 2, not content with slandering the people's legitimate candlelight actions against American beef import, and crying out for "rooting them out." 
					
					 The chief culprit causing public unrest is none other than the dictatorial junta such as Lee Myung Bak, the prosecution, the police and the "Intelligence Service", it charged. 
					
					 The statement chided the Lee Myung Bak group for working hard to railroad lots of evil bills through the "National Assembly" and frantically intensify the crackdown upon the progressive movement organizations in a bid to seek a way out of its ruling crisis in enforcing fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 Nothing can be expected from such henchman of the dictatorial regime, the statement said, demanding the public prosecutor general resign at once and the present "government" step down without fail.
